snippet: Bill Cosby, in an interview aired Saturday on NPR, refused to answer questions about allegations that he sexually assaulted several women decades ago.
abstract: Allegations that comedian and television personality Bill Cosby sexually assaulted women in 1980s are garnering renewed attention; accusations against Cosby, which he refused to address during NPR interview, have prompted him to cancel appearance on David Letterman show.
lead_paragraph: Bill Cosby, in an interview aired Saturday on NPR, refused to answer questions about allegations that he sexually assaulted several women decades ago.

headline.main: Cosby Is Off Another Show as Rape Accusations Swirl
headline.print_headline: Cosby Is Off Another Show as Rape Accusations Swirl
